00015     // EventHandler: a factory for producing event handlers w/ contextual scope
00016     // - context: an object with scope needed by handler
00017     // - handler: an event handler function
00018     var EventHandler = function( context, handler, e ){
00019       return(
00020         function( e ) {
00021           handler( context, e );
00022         }
00023       );
00024     };
